text.div:
ResourceStabilityCS CodeSystem

Terms that describe the possibility of losing access to a resource.

name: ResourceStabilityCS
title: ResourceStabilityCS
description: Terms that describe the possibility of losing access to a resource.

concept.display: Not at risk or minimal risk of losing the resource (or a significant portion of the income)
concept.definition: Not at risk or minimal risk of losing the resource (or a significant portion of the income)

concept.display: Some risk of losing the resource (or a significant portion of the resource)
concept.definition: Some risk of losing the resource (or a significant portion of the resource)

concept.display: Imminent risk of loss of the resource (or a significant portion of the resource)
concept.definition: Imminent risk of loss of the resource (or a significant portion of the resource)

concept.display: Recent loss of the resource (or a significant portion of the resource)
concept.definition: Recent loss of the resource (or a significant portion of the resource)
